problem_statement_suffix:
CRITICAL ENVIRONMENT RESTRICTIONS:
- DO NOT run conda install - ToS acceptance is blocked.
- DO NOT use Python open() function - it is FORBIDDEN.
- Use bash commands for file writing: echo, cat << EOF, etc.
- Use approved file editing tools (edit_file, write_file) instead of open().
- R packages (data.table, ggplot2, zoo, lab) may be missing.
- Check installed packages: Rscript -e "installed.packages()[,'Package']"
- Create directories before writing: mkdir -p ../results .R/library
